content:
Ahh got it, this is false, the unification fails too:
Tomas Skrivan said:

It looks like that λ x => ?m x (f x) can be unified with λ x => (f x * g x)

The unification in the mwe is actually fun (x : Nat) => ?_uniq.10 x (?_uniq.13 x) =?= fun (x : Nat) => f x * g x and it gets solved with ?_uniq.10 = λ x y => f x * y and ?_uniq.13 = g.
Tomas Skrivan has marked this topic as resolved.
